virtualTable.name: points_of_interest_education_and_health
virtualTable.sql: SELECT geom, "ref_no", "name", "pointx_class", "feature_easting", "feature_northing", "pos_accuracy", "uprn", "topo_toid", "topo_toid_version", "usrn", "usrn_mi", "distance", "address_detail", "street_name", "locality", "geographic_county", "postcode", "admin_boundary", "telephone_number", "url", "brand", "qualifier_type", "qualifier_data", "provenance", "supply_date" FROM points_of_interest WHERE "pointx_class" LIKE '5%'
